titles.title: Truth in Electricity Trading Act of 2002
To amend the Federal Power Act to prohibit round trip sales of electric power, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/22/2002--Introduced. Truth in Electricity Trading Act of 2002 - Amends the Federal Power Act to declare unlawful any transaction in which the same parties within any seven-day period purchase and subsequently sell, or sell and subsequently purchase, the same quantity of electric power at wholesale at the same price (round trip sales).
